channel.title: me on Ka Ian Chan
channel.description: Recent content in me on Ka Ian Chan

item.title: Creating my Website
item.description: I want a website I wanted to have my own personal website for a long time. I have tried to create a website many times. I tried to have my own website on 000webhostapp, hostinger and gihub with HTML and CSS, but these designs are usually so simple and unsatisfactory for me. Now I really want to build a new one! I am building this website with Hugo. This is a new way for me to build a website.
